import React,{useState} from 'react' import { connect } from 'react-redux' import {postAuction} from '../actions' import AuctionList from './AuctionList' function SellerDash(props) { const [fetchAgain, setFetchAgain] = useState(false) const [listing, setListing] = useState({ name: '', image: '', description: '', starting_price: '', deadline: '', user_id: props.user_id }) console.log(fetchAgain) const handleChange = (e) => { setListing({...listing, [e.target.name]: e.target.value}) } const handleSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault() props.postAuction(listing) setFetchAgain(true) setListing({ name: '', image: '', description: '', starting_price: '', deadline: '', user_id: props.user_id }) setFetchAgain(false) } return (

Sellers Dash

) } export default connect(state=>{ return{ user_id: state.crudReducer.user_id } }, {postAuction})(SellerDash)
